title: A psychopath, by any name
author: VD
content_html:
The wannabee Maccabee chimes in:


A fetus isn’t a person… How many wingnuts here approve of the death penalty/ I would guess 100% . of course you don’t want someone to “kill” a fetus. But you can’t wait to kill a fully grown person. hyposcrits.

Yes, that whole redefining humanity thing worked out really well circa 1941, didn’t it. You’d think Jews would be the last people on the planet to embrace abortion, euthanasia and gun control, but what’s the fun of learning history when you can repeat it instead.

And I can’t speak for anyone else, but I strongly oppose the death penalty, as I believe it is extremely unwise to allow the government to wield the power of life and death over its citizens. Considering that governments have murdered far more civilians in the 20th century than criminals have, I’d prefer to take my chances with the privately employed psychopaths.
